channel.title: Batch loading data
channel.description: Hello, if the data result exceeds a certain number of rows, the front-end page will be very stuck. For this situation, we can make a virtual paging function, load custom page data by default, and reloading after the default number of pages is exceeded. Pull data to achieve paged pull. This can reduce the loading load of the front-end page. This loading is only for visual tables and pivot tables.

item.title: Batch loading data
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
This feature is already adopted for development. The issue tracking it is here.

Read full topic

item.title: Batch loading data
item.dc:creator: guyu
item.description:
Hello, if the data result exceeds a certain number of rows, the front-end page will be very stuck. For this situation, we can make a virtual paging function, load custom page data by default, and reloading after the default number of pages is exceeded. Pull data to achieve paged pull. This can reduce the loading load of the front-end page. This loading is only for visual tables and pivot tables.
